<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This pass looks at the basic blocks each jump-table refers to and works out</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// whether they can be emitted in a compressed form (with 8 or 16-bit</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// entries). If so, it changes the opcode and flags them in the associated</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
